section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The Packaging Federation represents the interests of the UK Packaging Manufacturing Industry. 
The Packaging Federation is the “over-arching” trade association for the UK Packaging Manufacturing Industry. It is a unique representative body for companies and organisations in the UK packaging manufacturing sector and associated activities. 
 
It actively promotes the economic importance of the industry, its products, the considerable benefits that derive from the use of packaging and the industry’s responsible concern for both the community and the environment.
